articles.description: Kia will launch the Sonet facelift on January 12, with prices expected to start from around Rs 8 lakh (ex-showroom)     This is the first major refresh since its introduction in India back in 2020.    Bookings for the updated SUV are already open for Rs 25,00…

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Premier Energies bags Rs 1,700 crore order from NTPC - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The order is for NTPC's Nokh solar PV project in Rajasthan, a company statement said.
articles.content:
Premier Energies on Tuesday said it has bagged an order worth Rs 1,700 crore from NTPC for supply of 608 MW bifacial solar photovoltaic modules.
The order is for NTPC's Nokh solar PV project in Raja… [+295 chars]

articles.author: ETMarkets.com
articles.title: Buyback boom! Bajaj Auto shares zoom 6% to all-time high - The Economic Times
articles.description: Bajaj Auto's buyback size represents 40 lakh shares or 1.41% of the total number of equity shares of the company. Currently, promoter and promoter group entities hold 54.94% stake in Bajaj Auto, and foreign institutional investors hold 14.72%.
articles.content: Shares of two-wheeler major Bajaj Auto on Tuesday rallied up to 6% to hit record high of Rs 7,420 on BSE after the company's board approved a Rs 4,000-crore share buyback through the tender route.Inv… [+1635 chars]
